title: Honor Level 2?
body:
Hey Riot I am trying my best to be reformed  and not be toxic. I was wondering if you can tell me how my account status is for rewards. I have honor level 2 and i got a notification of getting extra key fragments for being a good sport. Does this mean I will get end of season rewards? 

All the best =){{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
In order to get end of season reward

Requirement:

Gold+ Solo Que or Flex Que

Did not get perma ban (OFC)

Did not get temp. ban in the last 2 week before Season end
----------------
At least this was what I remember for last season, things might have change for this season as Riot is making quite a few changes 

But I doubt you'll reform tho LOL

It's three months not two weeks BTW.

> But I doubt you'll reform tho LOL

Don't bash someone trying to reform. It's like laughing at a fat guy at gym and telling him he'll never get into shape.
thank you. I stopped typing in chat which has led me to win more games. glad there are people like you out there to support me =)
Best of luck bro

>  I was wondering if you can tell me how my account status is for rewards.

We gave everyone a free start on loot with the honor release.

> Does this mean I will get end of season rewards?

No. If you were banned, you will not be getting end of season rewards.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HfQmMQJH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-07-02T20:58:57.852+0000)
>
> We gave everyone a free start on loot with the honor release.
> 
> No. If you were banned, you will not be getting end of season rewards.

I honestly feel like ranked rewards shouldn't be taken away. I feel like that's overkill. And ranked rewards are supposed to be based on skill. In the nfl if a player gets suspended earlier in the year but their team wins a super bowl. That player still gets a ring.
I don't see why you should reward negative behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HfQmMQJH,comment-id=000200010001,timestamp=2017-07-03T05:14:49.150+0000)
>
> I don't see why you should reward negative behavior.

Youre not. Youre rewarding them for achieving their rank.

I don't feel you can separate one's accomplishments from their in game behavior when considering any rewards.

This has been consistent with loot, and even more so with the recent honor system.

> [{quoted}](name=scazzman,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HfQmMQJH,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2017-07-02T21:55:05.360+0000)
>
> I honestly feel like ranked rewards shouldn't be taken away. I feel like that's overkill. And ranked rewards are supposed to be based on skill. In the nfl if a player gets suspended earlier in the year but their team wins a super bowl. That player still gets a ring.

exactly......though i thought if you were banned like...2 months before the end of season you didn't get rewards. Less they randomly changed the rules again.

The ones from 2016 were

>Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
Players issued a ban of seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (from August 7 on) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
Players banned for boosting during the 2016 season remain ineligible for rewards.
Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be eligible.

Which will probably be something similar for this year
They last changed the eligibility rules in 2015, and they were the same in 2016.
It was a 14 day ban, There's no way to get end of season rewards if I'm consistently playing and getting honored?
No. Next year don't attack and heavily harass other players.
Oh the irony...
I think this player was suspended for 2 weeks, not permabanned. Is he eligible for rewards if he's all good until season's end?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon

While not this season's restrictions, they have remained consistent.
I had a 2 week ban and returned June 29th. I'm getting honored but how many games do I need to play to get my account status back to normal?
I would just focus on staying non toxic. You're on thin ice for a few months. Best of luck.

my friend had a 14 day ban before me and got a message saying his account is back to normal thanks for being a good player. something along the lines of that. Season Doesn't end until November and I came back into the game end of june. I hope to be fine since I'm getting honored almost every game.
Seems like any level of ban removes an account from end of season rewards. One more reason to avoid being toxic xD
nah riot emailed me saying if I continue my behavior I will be eligible for end of season rewards. I'm good fam. I keep getting key fragements and honors after every game. I am reformed =).
If you keep breaking the law you go to jail. If you stop breaking the law your reward is to not go to jail anymore.
